original_title: Top Chinese official in Colombo for talks
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Yuan Jiajun, a member of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China arrived to the island for a visit.
Yuan Jiajun, a member of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, is set to be in Sri Lanka until the July 23rd.
Yuan Jiajun also serves as the secretary of the Chongqing City Council in China, highlighting his prominent role in Chinese politics.
